steps.title: How to create your design
steps.content: Let’s create your special design together.

steps.title: Navigate to the 'Content' section
steps.content: In the top bar, locate and click on the 'Content' section.

steps.title: Go to 'Global Design'
steps.content: On the left-hand side, you will see the content tree, click on the 'Global Design' node.

steps.title: Available 'Design'
steps.content: On the right-hand side, you will see a grid of all 'Design' already created for your site. You can add as many of these as you wish.

steps.title: Create your own 'Design'
steps.content: Click on the 'Create Design' button above the existing design to add your custom.

steps.title: Name your new 'Design'
steps.content: In the field provided, enter a name for your new style.

steps.title: Check all tabs to create your unique design
steps.content: The functionality allows you to manage colors, fonts, header and footer, and logo of your website.

steps.title: Save the result
steps.content: Once you are happy with the changes, in the bottom right of the screen, hit 'Save and Publish'. Your updates are now live on your site! :-)

steps.title: Customize your fonts and colors
steps.content: Let’s customize your website.

steps.title: Navigate to the 'Content' section
steps.content: In the top bar, locate and click on the 'Content' section.

steps.title: Go to 'Global Design'
steps.content: On the left-hand side, you will see the content tree, click on the 'Global Design' node.

steps.title: Choose 'Design' that you want to edit
steps.content: On the right-hand side, you will see a grid of all 'Design' already available on you site.

steps.title: 'Colors tab'
steps.content: Go to the 'Colors' tab and add a personal touch to the site with your color scheme.

steps.title: Your Color Palette
steps.content: Add unlimited colors to your color palette and use them across the design. You can access the color from your color palette easily while editing the overall design and specific elements.

steps.title: How to choose the color for the UI element
steps.content: Open one of the tabs of 'Colors in design', and click on the color picker near the property you want to edit. You can apply the color from your palette or add any other color using the picker or color code.

steps.title: Go to the 'Fonts' tab
steps.content: Go to the 'Fonts' tab.

steps.title: Find the perfect 'Fonts' for your design
steps.content: Go to the 'Fonts' tab and choose from over a thousand fonts directly from Google Fonts. You can then assign an unlimited number of 'Fonts' as well as set the sizes, styles, etc through your site design.

steps.title: How to manage fonts
steps.content: Go to the 'Typography' field. You can apply the chosen fonts to the specific text elements, choose their size on different gadgets, and see the preview to understand what option will suit you best.

steps.title: Save the result
steps.content: Once you are happy with the changes, in the bottom right of the screen, hit 'Save and Publish'. Your updates are now live on your site! :-)

steps.title: How to upload your own
steps.content: Let’s do it together

steps.title: Navigate to the 'Content' section
steps.content: In the top bar, locate and click on the 'Content' section.

steps.title: Go to 'Global Design'
steps.content: On the left-hand side, you will see the content tree, click on the 'Global Design' node.

steps.title: Choose 'Design' that you want to edit
steps.content: On the right-hand side, you will see a grid of all 'Design' already available on you site.

steps.title: Go to the 'Logo' tab
steps.content: Go to the 'Logo' tab and add a personal touch to the site.

steps.title: Upload your logo and the hover image
steps.content: The logo will be automatically positioned on the header and footer of the website. The logo hover will appear when the user hovers over the logo with its mouse.

steps.title: Crop your 'Logo' and 'Logo Hover'
steps.content: After enabling the 'Logo' and 'Logo Hover' cropping functionality by clicking on the corresponding checkboxes, you can crop them as per your requirement. This feature is optional and not mandatory to use. If you choose not to crop, your uploaded logo will appear on the website as it is.

steps.title: Open 'Logo' Settings
steps.content: To crop your picture, open the Image settings by clicking on the image name.

steps.title: Go to the 'Logo' tab in the Picture Settings
steps.content: When you open the picture 'Settings', go the the 'Logo' Tab. Here you can adjust cropping your picture, using the scale on the bottom of dragging the logo to the needed position within the cropping field.

steps.content: Once you're happy with the result, in the bottom-right corner click 'Submit'.

name: Choose the Design for your website

steps.title: How to assign your new 'Design' to your site
steps.content: Let's add the final touches to personalizing your site design by assigning your new 'Design' to your site.

steps.title: Navigate to the 'Content' section
steps.content: In the top bar, locate and click on the 'Content' section.

steps.title: Go to 'Global Design'
steps.content: On the left-hand side, you will see the content tree, click on the 'Global Design' node.

steps.title: Choose 'Design' that you want to edit
steps.content: On the right-hand side, you will see a grid of all 'Design' already available on you site.

steps.title: Go to 'Content'
steps.content: Click on the right top corner to navigate to the 'Content' tab

steps.title: Add your new 'Design'
steps.content: Click on 'Add'. In the slide-out panel, navigate to and select the 'Design' you would like to use for your site.

steps.title: Save and Publish
steps.content: Once you are happy with the changes, in the bottom right of the screen, hit 'Save and Publish'. Your new design is now live on your site! :-)

name: Choose the Design for your page

steps.title: How to create a unique design for your page
steps.content: Let's add the final touches by creating the special design for some pages.

steps.title: Navigate to the 'Content' section
steps.content: In the top bar, locate and click on the 'Content' section.

steps.title: Choose the page
steps.content: Visit the 'Home' page or any other page to assign a unique design.

steps.title: Go to the page 'Settings'
steps.content: Click on the 'Settings' tab on the top bar

steps.title: Go to the 'Override design' field
steps.content: Click on 'Add'. In the slide-out panel, navigate to and select the 'Design' to be used for this page and all child pages. This will override the 'Design' selected on the parent page or within 'Global Design > Content'

steps.title: Save and Publish
steps.content: Once you are happy with the changes, in the bottom right of the screen, hit 'Save and Publish'. Your new design is now live on your site! :-)
